RT @FLGovScott Following my request, @POTUS has declared a major disaster for Hurricane Michael. I will continue to stay in contact with all of our federal, state and local partners as we respond to this devastating storm. This will allow more federal help to flow to our communities.

This past year has seen incredibly powerful storms on the Atlantic seaboard and the Gulf. Harvey, Irma, Maria, Florence, and now Michael have wrought severe damage. We must admit the intensity of these storms—greater than past years—is a symptom of a changing climate.
